message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider a price closer to $10,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To make it work, I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider one more compromise?
